tool_description: Need population data for any Village, City, Town, District, State, Country or even Continent? Place-Population-Finder API delivers! Get instant, accurate figures with one simple call. Optimize resources, target markets, and make informed decisions.
name: Place Population Finder API
title: Place Population Finder API

api_list.name: Get population by place
api_list.description: Get population of the place by sending a get request of the place name
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://place-population-finder-api.p.rapidapi.com/English"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "place-population-finder-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://place-population-finder-api.p.rapidapi.com/{place}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "place-population-finder-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
